description:
This file contains the implementation of several HTTP request handling functions for a web servlet object, specifically for processing UPnP-related methods such as Notify, Search, MSearch, MPost, Subscribe, and Unsubscribe. It defines how to handle requests when certain operations are supported or fallback to HTTP 405 responses when they are not.

The functions include 'BwspWsoDoNotify', 'BwspWsoDoSearch', 'BwspWsoDoMSearch', 'BwspWsoDoMPost', 'BwspWsoDoSubscribe', and 'BwspWsoDoUnsubscribe'. Each function takes standard object handles representing the request and response, executes specific logic (either calling external interface functions if available or constructing an 'Allow' header and replying with 'Method Not Allowed'), and returns an operation status.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspWsoDoNotify(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep)
methods.description: Processes a UPnP Notify request or returns a default Allow header if the external interface does not handle it.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspWsoDoSearch(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep)
methods.description: Processes a UPnP Search request or returns a default Allow header with Method Not Allowed.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspWsoDoMSearch(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep)
methods.description: Processes a UPnP MSearch request or returns a default Allow header with Method Not Allowed.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspWsoDoMPost(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep)
methods.description: Processes a UPnP MPost request or returns a default Allow header with Method Not Allowed.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspWsoDoSubscribe(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep)
methods.description: Processes a UPnP Subscribe request or returns a default Allow header with Method Not Allowed.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspWsoDoUnsubscribe(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep)
methods.description: Processes a UPnP Unsubscribe request or returns a default Allow header with Method Not Allowed.
